The portfolio sample includes loans originated between January 2005 and July 2007. The 2005-2007 dummy equals one for loans originated between 2005 and 2007, zero otherwise. Securitized in 2005-2007 is essentially an interaction term reflecting the marginal effect for loans securitized between 2005 and 2007. Specifications with the interaction term are estimated using linear model. Variable definitions are the same as in Table II. Loan purpose fixed effects include LBO, M&A and Debt repayment dummies. The coefficients are marginal effects. Standard errors are clustered by loan lead arranger. Significance at the 1%, 5%, and 10 % levels is indicated by *** , ** , and * , respectively.
